Navigation
Name Rascal/Expressions/Values/Number/arbInt

Synopsis Generate a random integer value.
Function
  • int arbInt( )
  • int arbInt(int limit)
Description Return an arbitrary integer value. When the argument limit is given, the generated value is in the interval [0, limit].
Examples 
rascal>import Integer;
ok
rascal>arbInt()
int: 635355592
rascal>arbInt()
int: -1606709548
rascal>arbInt()
int: 990387262
Benefits arbInt is a convenient generator for pseudo-random integers.
